west_desertsd19@sdesert.examine: Off to the west you see more desert.

north_desertsd38@sdesert.examine: You see more desert to the north.

east_desertsd17@sdesert.name: east_desertSD17
east_desertsd17@sdesert.examine: The path leads east, where it turns into a road.

south_desertsd15@sdesert.name: south_desertSD15
south_desertsd15@sdesert.examine: You see a bend up ahead.

south_desertsd11@sdesert.name: south_desertSD11
south_desertsd11@sdesert.examine: You see more of the mountainous road.

west_desertsd37@sdesert.name: west_desertSD37
west_desertsd37@sdesert.examine: The trail wanders of into the west.

objsd00@sdesert.name: objSD00

east_desertsd43@sdesert.name: east_desertSD43
east_desertsd43@sdesert.examine: You might be able to walk east through the brush...

north_desertsd19@sdesert.name: north_desertSD19

objsd02_1@sdesert.name: objSD02_1

objsd01_6@sdesert.desc[0]: A strange, dry weed attempts to grow out of the dust.

boulder_desertsd66@sdesert.name: boulder_desertSD66
boulder_desertsd66@sdesert.examine: You see a small hole, partially covered by a big &+yrock.
boulder_desertsd66@sdesert.desc[0]: The boulder has been moved aside revealing an opening.

east_desertsd09@sdesert.name: east_desertSD09
east_desertsd09@sdesert.examine: A path leads off into desert mountains.

This little thorn has come from the largest brand of cactus
known to man.
objsd08@sdesert.desc[0]: A cactus thorn lies here, almost under your feet.

objsd00_5@sdesert.desc[0]: A chipped rock is lying here, half-hidden in the weeds.

south_desertsd12@sdesert.name: south_desertSD12
south_desertsd12@sdesert.examine: You are displeased with the thought of travelling uphill.

east_desertsd64@sdesert.name: east_desertSD64
east_desertsd64@sdesert.examine: A small clearing lies to the east.

desert@sdesert.name: desert
desert@sdesert.examine: This is the largest desert you have ever seen...

west_desertsd18@sdesert.name: west_desertSD18
west_desertsd18@sdesert.examine: The road fades into a path to the west.

north_desertsd09@sdesert.name: north_desertSD09
north_desertsd09@sdesert.examine: A boring path leads northwards, perhaps to some famous land.

objsd00_4@sdesert.name: objSD00_4
objsd00_4@sdesert.desc[0]: A chipped rock is lying here, half-hidden in the weeds.

east_desertsd37@sdesert.name: east_desertSD37

south_desertsd02@sdesert.name: south_desertSD02
south_desertsd02@sdesert.examine: Far to the south you can barely make out a large rock of some sort.

north_desertsd17@sdesert.name: north_desertSD17
north_desertsd17@sdesert.examine: The path leads north into the heart of the desert mountains.

south_desertsd08@sdesert.name: south_desertSD08
south_desertsd08@sdesert.examine: The side of the mesa is impossible to climb.

boulder_desertsd46@sdesert.desc[1]: There is a large boulder here.
boulder_desertsd46@sdesert.name: boulder_desertSD46
boulder_desertsd46@sdesert.examine:
You see a small opening underneath it.
It looks as if it is movable...
boulder_desertsd46@sdesert.desc[0]: The boulder has been pushed aside, revealing an opening.

north_desertsd42@sdesert.name: north_desertSD42
north_desertsd42@sdesert.examine: To the north you see the desert.

north_desertsd44@sdesert.name: north_desertSD44
north_desertsd44@sdesert.examine: You see more brush to the north.

door_desertsd65@sdesert.name: door_desertSD65
door_desertsd65@sdesert.examine: You see a door to your west.

east_desertsd55@sdesert.name: east_desertSD55
east_desertsd55@sdesert.examine: You can go east from here.

north_desertsd45@sdesert.name: north_desertSD45
north_desertsd45@sdesert.examine: You see more brush to the north.

north_desertsd37@sdesert.name: north_desertSD37
north_desertsd37@sdesert.examine: You see more desert to the north.

north_desertsd13@sdesert.name: north_desertSD13
north_desertsd13@sdesert.examine: You see a dangerous road, almost unfit for travel.

south_desertsd13@sdesert.name: south_desertSD13
south_desertsd13@sdesert.examine: To the south the road leads through the mountains.

east_desertsd61@sdesert.name: east_desertSD61
east_desertsd61@sdesert.examine: The path disappears to the east.

north_desertsd16@sdesert.name: north_desertSD16
north_desertsd16@sdesert.examine: The road leads north into the Southern Desert.

east_desertsd14@sdesert.name: east_desertSD14
east_desertsd14@sdesert.examine: You gaze upon the Southern desert.

north_desertsd04@sdesert.name: north_desertSD04
north_desertsd04@sdesert.examine: The path lead off to the north.

objsd00_1@sdesert.name: objSD00_1

west_desertsd45@sdesert.examine: You see more brush to the west.

west_desertsd65@sdesert.name: west_desertSD65
west_desertsd65@sdesert.examine: You see Brush to the west.

east_desertsd13@sdesert.name: east_desertSD13
east_desertsd13@sdesert.examine: You see an overgrown trail, complete with fallen rocks.

objsd07@sdesert.name: objSD07
objsd07@sdesert.examine:
This necklace has been carefully crafted without tools,
out of the purest black quartz you have ever seen.
objsd07@sdesert.desc[0]: A necklace is here, made of shining stones.

objsd01_8@sdesert.name: objSD01_8
objsd01_8@sdesert.desc[0]: A strange, dry weed attempts to grow out of the dust.

north_desertsd25@sdesert.name: north_desertSD25
north_desertsd25@sdesert.examine: You see a more-travelled path to the north.

objsd06_1@sdesert.examine:
You see that it is a well-made headband, with an eagle's feather
sewn into it.
objsd06_1@sdesert.desc[0]: A leather headband is here, it is your destiny to wear it.

east_desertsd18@sdesert.name: east_desertSD18
east_desertsd18@sdesert.examine: You see a 'T' in the road to the east.

south_desertsd40@sdesert.examine: The mesa to the south ominously begins to blot out the sky.

east_desertsd51@sdesert.examine: You see a desert path, deserted.

south_desertsd00@sdesert.examine: A huge cactus-dotted desert spreads out before you.

east_desertsd45@sdesert.examine: You see more brush to the east.

painting@sdesert.name: painting
painting@sdesert.examine:
The paintings you see are very beautiful, and magic seems
to emanate from them.

south_desertsd41@sdesert.name: south_desertSD41
south_desertsd41@sdesert.examine: The trail continues to the south, through the desert weeds.

west_desertsd55@sdesert.name: west_desertSD55
west_desertsd55@sdesert.examine: A small trail goes west from here.

west_desertsd05@sdesert.name: west_desertSD05
west_desertsd05@sdesert.examine: A fork in the path lies to the west.

east_desertsd10@sdesert.name: east_desertSD10
east_desertsd10@sdesert.examine: To the east the mountains begin to rise, as your spirits fall.

west_desertsd52@sdesert.examine: A small trail goes west from here.

objsd05_1@sdesert.examine: It seems to be lightweight, but effective armor.

door_desertsd67@sdesert.name: door_desertSD67
door_desertsd67@sdesert.examine:
There is a slight depression in the stone dwelling to your east,
making a circle that seems to be the only entrance to it.
door_desertsd67@sdesert.desc[2]: You see the front end of a stone wigwam of some sort.

objsd08_3@sdesert.name: objSD08_3

This little thorn has come from the largest brand of cactus
known to man.
objsd08_3@sdesert.desc[0]: A cactus thorn lies here, almost under your feet.

objsd05@sdesert.examine: It seems to be lightweight, but effective armor.
objsd05@sdesert.desc[0]: An Indian bone breastplate is here.

south_desertsd01@sdesert.name: south_desertSD01
south_desertsd01@sdesert.examine: The heat makes the desert to the south shimmer.

south_desertsd16@sdesert.name: south_desertSD16
south_desertsd16@sdesert.examine: The road to the south ends in a 'T'.

south_desertsd06@sdesert.name: south_desertSD06
south_desertsd06@sdesert.examine: The path look like it disappears to the east.

south_desertsd04@sdesert.name: south_desertSD04
south_desertsd04@sdesert.examine: A large mesa looms up in the south.

south_desertsd25@sdesert.name: south_desertSD25
south_desertsd25@sdesert.examine: You see more desert to the south.

objsd01_4@sdesert.name: objSD01_4
objsd01_4@sdesert.desc[0]: A strange, dry weed attempts to grow out of the dust.

objsd04@sdesert.name: objSD04
objsd04@sdesert.examine:
This is the oldest of all daggers, and by far the best. Ancient
enscriptions are scratched into its quartz-like surface, and the
entire dagger seems to become part of your arm.
objsd04@sdesert.desc[0]: A black dagger exists here, hovering about seven inches off the ground.

objsd03@sdesert.name: objSD03
objsd03@sdesert.desc[0]: A vicious spear is struck into the earth here, daring you to take it.

west_desertsd07@sdesert.name: west_desertSD07
west_desertsd07@sdesert.examine: The west doesn't seem as glorious as it does in all those old movies.

south_desertsd07@sdesert.name: south_desertSD07
south_desertsd07@sdesert.examine: You rub your eyes and try to make out the split in the path to the south.

east_desertsd62@sdesert.name: east_desertSD62
east_desertsd62@sdesert.examine: You can't see far into the silent brush to the east...

objsd02_2@sdesert.name: objSD02_2
objsd02_2@sdesert.desc[0]: A strange little axe is here, abandoned on the ground.

north_desertsd12@sdesert.name: north_desertSD12
north_desertsd12@sdesert.examine: To the north you look down onto flatter ground.

west_desertsd44@sdesert.name: west_desertSD44
west_desertsd44@sdesert.examine: You see more brush to the west.

north_desertsd30@sdesert.name: north_desertSD30
north_desertsd30@sdesert.examine: You see the trail here leads north.

west_desertsd14@sdesert.name: west_desertSD14
west_desertsd14@sdesert.examine: You look back to the desert mountains.

south_desertsd09@sdesert.name: south_desertSD09
south_desertsd09@sdesert.examine: Your eyes hurt, due to the continuous desert scene.

south_desertsd37@sdesert.name: south_desertSD37
south_desertsd37@sdesert.examine: You see more desert to the south.

north_desertsd41@sdesert.name: north_desertSD41
north_desertsd41@sdesert.examine: You see more desert to the north.

objsd01_9@sdesert.name: objSD01_9
objsd01_9@sdesert.desc[0]: A strange, dry weed attempts to grow out of the dust.

objsd08_2@sdesert.examine:
This little thorn has come from the largest brand of cactus
known to man.
objsd08_2@sdesert.desc[0]: A cactus thorn lies here, almost under your feet.

south_desertsd32@sdesert.name: south_desertSD32
south_desertsd32@sdesert.examine: A rocky mesa lies to the south.

pottery@sdesert.name: pottery
pottery@sdesert.examine: This appears to be the only good piece left among the broken ones.
pottery@sdesert.desc[0]: A well made piece of Indian pottery remains here.

west_desertsd23@sdesert.name: west_desertSD23
west_desertsd23@sdesert.examine: You see the Southern desert to the west.

objsd06_2@sdesert.name: objSD06_2
objsd06_2@sdesert.examine:
You see that it is a well-made headband, with an eagle's feather
sewn into it.
objsd06_2@sdesert.desc[0]: A leather headband is here, it is your destiny to wear it.

east_desertsd04@sdesert.name: east_desertSD04
east_desertsd04@sdesert.examine: The path forks off to the east, where it disappears into the brush.

north_desertsd43@sdesert.name: north_desertSD43
north_desertsd43@sdesert.examine: You see more desert to the north.

east_desertsd23@sdesert.name: east_desertSD23
east_desertsd23@sdesert.examine: You see mountains to the east.

objsd01_1@sdesert.name: objSD01_1
objsd01_1@sdesert.desc[0]: A strange, dry weed attempts to grow out of the dust.

south_desertsd42@sdesert.name: south_desertSD42
south_desertsd42@sdesert.examine: You begin to fear the mesa to the south...

objsd67@sdesert.name: objSD67
objsd67@sdesert.examine: It is red, but not like any red you have ever seen.
objsd67@sdesert.desc[0]: A red feather is lying here.

desertsd34@sdesert.title: The Southern Desert
desertsd34@sdesert.description:
The desert stretches out in every direction, a rugged terrain 
reminding you of the moon.  A way off to the south-west you can 
just see a mesa, sitting on the horizon.

desertsd27@sdesert.title: An Overgrown Trail
desertsd27@sdesert.description:
You are walking down a trail, overgrown with cactus and other dry 
plants.  A path leads &+yeast&* from here, off into the distance.

desertsd63@sdesert.title: A Brush-Filled Trail
desertsd63@sdesert.description:
The &+ydesert&* stretches out in every direction, and you can no 
longer make out a path.

desertsd58@sdesert.title: The Southern Desert
desertsd58@sdesert.description:
The desert stretches out in every direction, and the main
path leads north and south.

desertsd02@sdesert.title: The Southern Desert
desertsd02@sdesert.description:
Heat waves make the world shimmer, as you trod through what feels like 
an oven. Plants of all sorts cling to the dry ground here, barely surviving 
the dry heat. The only sound is the low whisper of hot wind, and the small
rustling of rodents fleeing from your presence. The path continues &+Csouth.

desertsd62@sdesert.title: A Brush-Filled Trail
desertsd62@sdesert.description:
The desert stretches out in every direction, and the main
path leads &+yeast&*; westward it begins to diminish....

desertsd12@sdesert.title: The Desert Foothills
desertsd12@sdesert.description:
Here the desert forbids your life to get any easier, and 
you are forced to exert yourself to travel uphill.  Cursing 
mother nature, you ignore your thirst and plod onward.
   To the &+ysouth&* the mountains rise up out of the earth like
an ill specter. Other trails go &+ynorth and east.

desertsd37@sdesert.title: Way Out In The Southern Desert
desertsd37@sdesert.description: The desert stretches out in every direction.

desertsd59@sdesert.title: The Southern Desert
desertsd59@sdesert.description:
The desert stretches out in every direction, and the main
path leads north and south.

desertsd35@sdesert.title: The Southern Desert
desertsd35@sdesert.description:
The desert stretches out in every direction, a rugged terrain 
reminding you of the moon.  Quite a way off to the south-west you can 
just see a mesa, sitting on the horizon.

desertsd24@sdesert.title: The Southern Desert
desertsd24@sdesert.description:
The desert stretches out in every direction but east, where large
rock sticks out of the sand and looks unclimbable.

desertsd05@sdesert.title: A Choked Footpath
desertsd05@sdesert.description:
The footpath here leads &+yeast&* and &+ywest&*, nearly choked in parts
with sagebrush and cacti. Up ahead you see...can it be true?
is that a Taco Bell you see?

desertsd30@sdesert.title: Way Out In The Desert
desertsd30@sdesert.description:
You are nowhere near where everyone else wants to be.
How do you feel about thatQUESTIONMARK

desertsd23@sdesert.title: The Southern Desert
desertsd23@sdesert.description:
The desert stretches out in every direction, a rugged terrain 
reminding you of the moon.  The mountains to the &+Ceast&* are snow-capped,
and rocky.

desertsd20@sdesert.title: The Southern Desert
desertsd20@sdesert.description:
The desert stretches out in every direction, a rugged terrain 
reminding you of the moon.

desertsd10@sdesert.title: Lonely Desert Mountains
desertsd10@sdesert.description:
Here you stand in the foothills of the mountains to the
&+yeast&*. The vegetation dies around you, as the insects sing their
lonesome song. The trail splits &+ywest.

desertsd54@sdesert.title: A Cactus-Infested Area
desertsd54@sdesert.description:
You wander between large cacti and jagged rocks, trying to 
stay away from all those darn pricks.
The trail leads north and east from here.

desertsd22@sdesert.title: The Southern Desert
desertsd22@sdesert.description:
The desert stretches out in every direction, a rugged terrain 
reminding you of the moon.  You can barely see mountains on the east 
horizon.

desertsd29@sdesert.title: Way Out In The Desert
desertsd29@sdesert.description:
You have travelled out so far now that you have almost forgotten 
what water looks and tastes like.

desertsd66@sdesert.title: A Small Cave
desertsd66@sdesert.description:
As your eyes begin to adjust, you can make out scattered bits
of bone and broken pottery strewn across the floor. To one corner 
you see the remains of what looks like a campfire. Feeling 
claustrophobic, you suddenly feel the urge to leave!

desertsd56@sdesert.title: In The Brush
desertsd56@sdesert.description:
The sage brush and tumbleweeds here press in all around you,
making it a bit hard to walk.

desertsd48@sdesert.title: The Southern Desert
desertsd48@sdesert.description:
The path has disappeared completely, leaving you free to
choose any direction at all.

desertsd55@sdesert.title: The Southern Desert
desertsd55@sdesert.description:
The desert stretches out in every direction, and a faint trail
runs off to the &+gwest&*. The main path leads north and south.

desertsd44@sdesert.title: In The Brush
desertsd44@sdesert.description:
You are completely surrounded by tumbleweeds now, and 
the world is deathly silent.

desertsd14@sdesert.title: The Disappearing Path
desertsd14@sdesert.description:
Here you stop, and gaze of into the panoramic view to the &+Ceast. 
The path here has ceased to exist, due to the severe drop down to 
the rest of the desert far below you. Off in the distance you see 
a huge landmark, that looks strikingly similar to an enormous 
crater.

desertsd36@sdesert.title: The Southern Desert
desertsd36@sdesert.description:
The desert stretches out in every direction, a rugged terrain 
reminding you of the moon.  Far off to the south-west you can 
barely see a mesa, sitting on the horizon.

desertsd32@sdesert.title: The Southern Desert
desertsd32@sdesert.description:
The desert stretches out in every direction, a rugged terrain 
reminding you of the moon.  Off to the &+ysouth&* you can 
see a mesa, rising up from the horizon.

desertsd33@sdesert.title: The Southern Desert
desertsd33@sdesert.description:
The desert stretches out in every direction, a rugged terrain 
reminding you of the moon.  Off to the south-west you can 
see a mesa, sitting on the horizon.

desertsd41@sdesert.title: Way Out In The Southern Desert
desertsd41@sdesert.description: The desert stretches out in every direction.

desertsd03@sdesert.title: Near A Large Mesa
desertsd03@sdesert.description:
To the &+ysouth&* you can barely see a huge, low, mesa, sitting
solidly as it has been from the beginning of time. Looking
northward brings no rewards, it just hurts your eyes.

desertsd52@sdesert.title: The Southern Desert
desertsd52@sdesert.description:
The desert stretches out in every direction, and a faint trail
runs off to the &+gwest.

desertsd11@sdesert.title: The Desert Mountains
desertsd11@sdesert.description:
Here the ground has risen up, forcing you to exert yourself
harder. Those precious movement points slip away as you trod 
over the now rocky road. Stray critters scamper about, praying
to their critter gods that you will quickly leave the area. 
   The road here curves to the &+ysouth and west.

desertsd18@sdesert.title: A Dusty Road
desertsd18@sdesert.description:
Here the land is harsh and hot, reminding you of your
4th-grade teacher.

desertsd47@sdesert.title: The Southern Desert
desertsd47@sdesert.description: This is the largest desert you have ever seen...

desertsd60@sdesert.title: The Southern Desert
desertsd60@sdesert.description:
The desert stretches out in every direction, and the main
path leads north and south.

desertsd00@sdesert.title: The Beginning Of The Southern Desert
desertsd00@sdesert.description:
This path marks the beginning of the long road to the southern 
part of the world.  There are several rumors as to where it leads,
but no one knows for sure.  Looking &+gsouth&*, you gaze into a panorama
of a rocky, cactus-dotted land, shimmering in the heat of the day.

desertsd19@sdesert.title: A Dusty 'T' Intersection
desertsd19@sdesert.description:
The dusty road here splits to the east and to the &+ywest&*. The
desert continues to the south.
There is a blinking construction sign here, blocking the east way.

desertsd42@sdesert.title: North Of A Rocky Mesa
desertsd42@sdesert.description:
Here the going becomes more rugged, as outcroppings of rock 
jut up through the desert floor.
   The mesa to the &+ysouth&* seems ominously silent...

desertsd61@sdesert.title: The Southern Desert
desertsd61@sdesert.description:
The desert stretches out in every direction, and the main
paths leads north and &+yeast&*.  Some tracks lead southward.

desertsd06@sdesert.title: The Mirage
desertsd06@sdesert.description:
Nearly delirious from the heat and thirst, you totter up to  
the front steps of the Taco Bell. (or is it Taco Hell?) Stumbling through
the weeds, you suddenly realize that this is all some deadly trick
of the desert. The mirage quivers, and disappears before your
bloodshot eyes. 
   The path here leads &+yeast and west&*.

desertsd51@sdesert.title: Cactus Land
desertsd51@sdesert.description:
You wander between large cacti and jagged rocks, trying to 
stay away from all the pricks.
The trail leads &+geast and south&* from here.

desertsd53@sdesert.title: A Cactus-Infested Area
desertsd53@sdesert.description:
You wander between large cacti and jagged rocks, trying to 
stay away from all the pricks.
The trail leads north and south from here.

desertsd64@sdesert.title: A Clearer Trail
desertsd64@sdesert.description:
The trail here is clearing a little, you carefully notice 
broken twigs and brush-marks on the &+ydesert&* floor.

desertsd43@sdesert.title: Way Out In The Southern Desert
desertsd43@sdesert.description: The desert stretches out in every direction.

desertsd17@sdesert.title: A Bend In The Fading Road
desertsd17@sdesert.description:
Here the road bends, on end leads &+ynorth&* and the other leads &+yeast.
You are surrounded by sage brush, and heat. You can barely make out 
a path to the south.

desertsd21@sdesert.title: The Southern Desert
desertsd21@sdesert.description:
The desert stretches out in every direction, a rugged terrain 
reminding you of the moon. You can barely see mountains on the east 
horizon.

desertsd25@sdesert.title: An Overgrown Trail
desertsd25@sdesert.description:
You are walking down a trail, overgrown with cactus and other dry 
plants.

desertsd28@sdesert.title: A Faded Footpath
desertsd28@sdesert.description:
The heat is wearing on you, as you stumble along here. 
The trail leads south, east, and west with no obvious intent 
or purpose.

desertsd39@sdesert.title: Way Out In The Southern Desert
desertsd39@sdesert.description: The desert stretches out in every direction.

desertsd16@sdesert.title: The Foothills
desertsd16@sdesert.description:
With the worst of the mountains to the &+ynorth&*, the trail here 
becomes easier. Far off to the east you think you see blue.
to the &+ysouth&* the dusty road continues.

desertsd38@sdesert.title: Way Out In The Southern Desert
desertsd38@sdesert.description: The desert stretches out in every direction.

desertsd09@sdesert.title: Another Split In The Path
desertsd09@sdesert.description:
The path splits here, one part leading off to the &+yeast&* and
the other continuing to the &+ysouth&*. Scanning the horizon, you see 
nothing but dry, dull, weeds, and the occasional stately Saguaro
cactus.  You wonder how the world got to be so darn ugly.

desertsd40@sdesert.title: Near A Rocky Mesa
desertsd40@sdesert.description:
The desert stretches out in every direction, a rugged terrain 
reminding you of the moon.  To the &+ysouth&* the mesa looms nearer,
you think you can hear strange singing blowing in the wind.

desertsd67@sdesert.title: Inside A Small Stone Dwelling
desertsd67@sdesert.description:
It is very dark in here, and you shiver despite the heat
of the desert outside.  A circle of stones lies in the dust, 
looking Enchanted in placement. The walls around you are covered 
with &+Mpaintings&* of what could be identified as scenes from the 
beginning of the world.

desertsd49@sdesert.title: The Southern Desert
desertsd49@sdesert.description:
The small trail you have been painstakingly following
leads to the north and south, and a smaller trail wanders to the west.

desertsd07@sdesert.title: A Curve In The Path
desertsd07@sdesert.description:
The small path you have been carefully following turns to the
south, and runs off to the west.  The sage here now begins to irritate 
you, as it is spreading little burrs under your clothing. You are now
hoping that soon one of the oasis you see will be real.

desertsd50@sdesert.title: The Southern Desert
desertsd50@sdesert.description:
The small trail you have been painstakingly following
leads to the north and south, with no end in sight.

desertsd65@sdesert.title: A Small Clearing
desertsd65@sdesert.description:
You have arrived at what seems to be the uttermost southern 
point of the Earth.  To the east there is what seems to you to be a
large Indian-style dwelling of some sort, made of a dark quartz-like 
stone.  About half way up it you can see the outlines of a sealed door.
Looking about, you wonder why you begin to hear noises...

desertsd45@sdesert.title: In The Brush
desertsd45@sdesert.description:
Here you decide not to go any further, due to the increasing 
number of brambles getting caught in your clothes.

desertsd46@sdesert.title: The Mesa
desertsd46@sdesert.description:
You have finally reached the mesa. The rocky formation reached up
to about the height of 200 feet, there is no way you could ever climb
it. Directly to the south you spot a small hole.

desertsd26@sdesert.title: Way Out In The Southern Desert
desertsd26@sdesert.description:
Here the air is as dry as your step-mother's humor.
(Thank God she's not here to watch you mud.)

desertsd04@sdesert.title: A Fork In The Path
desertsd04@sdesert.description:
The small footpath you have been following splits here; 
one part leading off to the &+geast&* where it disappears into the 
sagebrush. To the &+ysouth&* the path continues, getting 
more and more overgrown as it goes.  Near to the south 
the northern edge of the large mesa looms up, a black wall 
against the sky.

desertsd08@sdesert.title: The Large Mesa
desertsd08@sdesert.description:
To the south a great, impassable rock wall looms high above 
you. It seems to sneer at you, puny compared to its enormous 
size...it least you're in the shade.  A small footpath leads 
north from here.

desertsd15@sdesert.title: The Desert Mountains
desertsd15@sdesert.description: You grow weary as you trod through these dry mountains.

desertsd57@sdesert.title: In The Brush
desertsd57@sdesert.description:
The sage brush and tumbleweeds here press in all around you,
making it a bit hard to walk.

desertsd31@sdesert.title: The Southern Desert
desertsd31@sdesert.description:
The desert stretches out in every direction, a rugged terrain 
reminding you of the moon.  Far off to the south-west you can 
barely see a mesa, sitting on the horizon.

desertsd01@sdesert.title: The Beginning Of The Southern Desert
desertsd01@sdesert.description:
Scrub brush and cacti of many sorts are beginning to
appear, you are thankful that they do not grow on the path.
To the &+gsouth&*, you see a desert, teeming with desert life.

desertsd13@sdesert.title: A Fork In The Rocky Road
desertsd13@sdesert.description:
Here you really have to be careful as you travel. The number
of rocks and dust particles in the path seems to rise with 
the number of steps you take.  A trail leads off to the &+yeast, 
and the path continues &+ysouth.

mobsd07_2@sdesert.name: mobSD07_2
mobsd07_2@sdesert.examine:
This man is sent out into the desert for one reason,
to keep you away from something.
mobsd07_2@sdesert.description: An Indian scout sneaks about here, glaring at you with suspicious eyes.

mobsd05_1@sdesert.name: mobSD05_1
mobsd05_1@sdesert.examine:
This vicious-looking animal looks both angry and hungry.
Provocation would surely bring him to a spastic frenzy!
mobsd05_1@sdesert.description: A razorback boar stands here, looking angry as hell.

mobsd05@sdesert.name: mobSD05
mobsd05@sdesert.examine:
This vicious-looking animal looks both angry and hungry.
Provocation would surely bring him to a spastic frenzy!
mobsd05@sdesert.description: A razorback boar stands here, looking angry as hell.

ostrich@sdesert.name: ostrich
ostrich@sdesert.examine: This thing's has got a nasty kick if threatened.
ostrich@sdesert.description: An ostrich trots by, looking for the savannah.

mobsd11_1@sdesert.name: mobSD11_1
mobsd11_1@sdesert.examine:
You are amazed at this bird's size.  You are awed at its grand
presence.  You really shouldn't kill it, it might be illegal.
mobsd11_1@sdesert.description: The Giant condor peers off into the south...

mobsd11_4@sdesert.name: mobSD11_4
mobsd11_4@sdesert.examine:
You are amazed at this bird's size.  You are awed at its grand
presence.  You really shouldn't kill it, it might be illegal.
mobsd11_4@sdesert.description: The Giant condor peers off into the south...

mobsd02_1@sdesert.name: mobSD02_1
mobsd02_1@sdesert.examine:
You have never seen anything like it. This plant can actually change its
position over time! Sharp spines stick out dangerously, threatening to
prick you.
mobsd02_1@sdesert.description: There is a strange looking cactus here.

mobsd00_8@sdesert.name: mobSD00_8
mobsd00_8@sdesert.examine:
This wee armadillo looks fairly well-armored.  Doesn't look like
he could do much damage, but would still be difficult to kill.
mobsd00_8@sdesert.description: A small rodent with armored scales slowly crosses the path.

mobsd07_3@sdesert.name: mobSD07_3
mobsd07_3@sdesert.examine:
This man is sent out into the desert for one reason,
to keep you away from something.
mobsd07_3@sdesert.description: An Indian scout sneaks about here, glaring at you with suspicious eyes.

mobsd00_6@sdesert.name: mobSD00_6
mobsd00_6@sdesert.examine:
This wee armadillo looks fairly well-armored.  Doesn't look like
he could do much damage, but would still be difficult to kill.
mobsd00_6@sdesert.description: A small rodent with armored scales slowly crosses the path.

mobsd03@sdesert.name: mobSD03
mobsd03@sdesert.examine:
This dog looks like it has never been tamed. Its fur stands
on end, and it is full of brambles. You don't think you should 
pet it.
mobsd03@sdesert.description: A thin, mangy beast lurks about here.

mobsd02_6@sdesert.name: mobSD02_6
mobsd02_6@sdesert.examine:
You have never seen anything like it. This plant can actually change its
position over time! Sharp spines stick out dangerously, threatening to
prick you.
mobsd02_6@sdesert.description: There is a strange looking cactus here.

kangaroorat@sdesert.name: kangaroorat
kangaroorat@sdesert.description: A small kangaroo rat is digging for catcus seeds here.

mobsd07_1@sdesert.name: mobSD07_1
mobsd07_1@sdesert.examine:
This man is sent out into the desert for one reason,
to keep you away from something.
mobsd07_1@sdesert.description: An Indian scout sneaks about here, glaring at you with suspicious eyes.

mobsd04@sdesert.name: mobSD04
mobsd04@sdesert.examine:
This small but feisty rodent has absolutely no brains.
It is sitting here, just waiting to follow a crowd.
mobsd04@sdesert.description: A lemming pauses here, looking for a cliff to leap off.

mobsd01_1@sdesert.name: mobSD01_1
mobsd01_1@sdesert.examine: The tarantula loves its privacy, and hopes you will soon leave.
mobsd01_1@sdesert.description: An oversized, hairy spider scuttles away.

mobsd09@sdesert.name: mobSD09
mobsd09@sdesert.examine:
This large man has very dark skin, from standing at attention
in the desert sun for hours on end. He eats cactus thorns for 
breakfast, and sleeps on rocks. You wish you were this tough.
mobsd09@sdesert.description: A massive Indian guard is here, ready to defend his post to the death!

mobsd04_2@sdesert.name: mobSD04_2
mobsd04_2@sdesert.examine:
This small but feisty rodent has absolutely no brains.
It is sitting here, just waiting to follow a crowd.
mobsd04_2@sdesert.description: A lemming pauses here, looking for a cliff to leap off.

mobsd06_6@sdesert.name: mobSD06_6
mobsd06_6@sdesert.examine:
This snake is doing its best to blend in with its surroundings.
Most of its victims usually get attacked because they step on it.
mobsd06_6@sdesert.description: A rattler is coiled up here, trying to be invisible.

mobsd06_3@sdesert.name: mobSD06_3
mobsd06_3@sdesert.examine:
This snake is doing its best to blend in with its surroundings.
Most of its victims usually get attacked because they step on it.
mobsd06_3@sdesert.description: A rattler is coiled up here, trying to be invisible.

mobsd12_2@sdesert.name: mobSD12_2
mobsd12_2@sdesert.examine: This little beast would be very frightening if it were larger.
mobsd12_2@sdesert.description: A spiky-looking horny toad is here, taking an afternoon nap.

mobsd00@sdesert.name: mobSD00
mobsd00@sdesert.examine:
This wee armadillo looks fairly well-armored.  Doesn't look like
he could do much damage, but would still be difficult to kill.
mobsd00@sdesert.description: A small rodent with armored scales slowly crosses the path.

mobsd12_3@sdesert.name: mobSD12_3
mobsd12_3@sdesert.examine: This little beast would be very frightening if it were larger.
mobsd12_3@sdesert.description: A spiky-looking horny toad is here, taking an afternoon nap.

mobsd00_4@sdesert.name: mobSD00_4
mobsd00_4@sdesert.examine:
This wee armadillo looks fairly well-armored.  Doesn't look like
he could do much damage, but would still be difficult to kill.
mobsd00_4@sdesert.description: A small rodent with armored scales slowly crosses the path.

position over time! Sharp spines stick out dangerously, threatening to
prick you.

presence.  You really shouldn't kill it, it might be illegal.
mobsd11_2@sdesert.description: The Giant condor peers off into the south...

mobsd03_4@sdesert.name: mobSD03_4
mobsd03_4@sdesert.examine:
This dog looks like it has never been tamed. Its fur stands
on end, and it is full of brambles. You don't think you should pet it.
mobsd03_4@sdesert.description: A thin, mangy beast lurks about here.

mobsd00_5@sdesert.examine:
This wee armadillo looks fairly well-armored.  Doesn't look like

mobsd06_5@sdesert.description: A rattler is coiled up here, trying to be invisible.

mobsd12@sdesert.examine: This little beast would be very frightening if it were larger.
mobsd12@sdesert.description: A spiky-looking horny toad is here, taking an afternoon nap.

mobsd02_5@sdesert.description: There is a strange looking cactus here.

mobsd06_7@sdesert.description: A rattler is coiled up here, trying to be invisible.

mobsd00_9@sdesert.description: A small rodent with armored scales slowly crosses the path.

mobsd01_5@sdesert.description: An oversized, hairy spider scuttles away.

mobsd02_7@sdesert.description: There is a strange looking cactus here.

mobsd02_3@sdesert.description: There is a strange looking cactus here.

mobsd04_3@sdesert.description: A lemming pauses here, looking for a cliff to leap off.

mobsd01_2@sdesert.description: An oversized, hairy spider scuttles away.

mobsd06@sdesert.description: A rattler is coiled up here, trying to be invisible.

mobsd01_3@sdesert.examine: The tarantula loves its privacy, and hopes you will soon leave.
mobsd01_3@sdesert.description: An oversized, hairy spider scuttles away.

mobsd01@sdesert.name: mobSD01
mobsd01@sdesert.examine: The tarantula loves its privacy, and hopes you will soon leave.
mobsd01@sdesert.description: An oversized, hairy spider scuttles away.

mobsd11_3@sdesert.name: mobSD11_3
mobsd11_3@sdesert.examine:
You are amazed at this bird's size.  You are awed at its grand
presence.  You really shouldn't kill it, it might be illegal.
mobsd11_3@sdesert.description: The Giant condor peers off into the south...

mobsd10@sdesert.name: mobSD10
mobsd10@sdesert.examine:
Slashing Boar looks right back at you, and you can somehow sense
that he would just as soon kill you as look at you.
mobsd10@sdesert.description: The Indian ruler of the south is here, smoking a strange weed.

mobsd07@sdesert.name: mobSD07
mobsd07@sdesert.examine:
This man is sent out into the desert for one reason,
to keep you away from something.
mobsd07@sdesert.description: An Indian scout sneaks about here, glaring at you with suspicious eyes.

mobsd11@sdesert.name: mobSD11
mobsd11@sdesert.examine:
You are amazed at this bird's size.  You are awed at its grand
presence.  You really shouldn't kill it, it might be illegal.
mobsd11@sdesert.description: The Giant condor peers off into the south...

mobsd03_7@sdesert.name: mobSD03_7
mobsd03_7@sdesert.examine:
This dog looks like it has never been tamed. Its fur stands
on end, and it is full of brambles. You don't think you should pet it.
mobsd03_7@sdesert.description: A thin, mangy beast lurks about here.

mobsd05_2@sdesert.name: mobSD05_2
mobsd05_2@sdesert.examine:
This vicious-looking animal looks both angry and hungry.
Provocation would surely bring him to a spastic frenzy!
mobsd05_2@sdesert.description: A razorback boar stands here, looking angry as hell.

mobsd05_3@sdesert.examine:
This vicious-looking animal looks both angry and hungry.
Provocation would surely bring him to a spastic frenzy!
mobsd05_3@sdesert.description: A razorback boar stands here, looking angry as hell.

This wee armadillo looks fairly well-armored.  Doesn't look like
he could do much damage, but would still be difficult to kill.
mobsd00_2@sdesert.description: A small rodent with armored scales slowly crosses the path.

mobsd00_7@sdesert.description: A small rodent with armored scales slowly crosses the path.

mobsd01_6@sdesert.description: An oversized, hairy spider scuttles away.

mobsd06_4@sdesert.description: A rattler is coiled up here, trying to be invisible.

mobsd02@sdesert.name: mobSD02
mobsd02@sdesert.examine:
You have never seen anything like it. This plant can actually change its
position over time! Sharp spines stick out dangerously, threatening to
prick you.
mobsd02@sdesert.description: There is a strange looking cactus here.

mobsd03_2@sdesert.name: mobSD03_2
mobsd03_2@sdesert.examine:
This dog looks like it has never been tamed. Its fur stands
on end, and it is full of brambles. You don't think you should 
pet it.
mobsd03_2@sdesert.description: A thin, mangy beast lurks about here.

mobsd01_7@sdesert.name: mobSD01_7
mobsd01_7@sdesert.examine: The tarantula loves its privacy, and hopes you will soon leave.
mobsd01_7@sdesert.description: An oversized, hairy spider scuttles away.

mobsd03_6@sdesert.name: mobSD03_6
mobsd03_6@sdesert.examine:
This dog looks like it has never been tamed. Its fur stands
on end, and it is full of brambles. You don't think you should pet it.
mobsd03_6@sdesert.description: A thin, mangy beast lurks about here.

mobsd00_3@sdesert.name: mobSD00_3
mobsd00_3@sdesert.examine:
This wee armadillo looks fairly well-armored.  Doesn't look like
he could do much damage, but would still be difficult to kill.
mobsd00_3@sdesert.description: A small rodent with armored scales slowly crosses the path.

mobsd01_4@sdesert.name: mobSD01_4
mobsd01_4@sdesert.examine: The tarantula loves its privacy, and hopes you will soon leave.
mobsd01_4@sdesert.description: An oversized, hairy spider scuttles away.

mobsd03_1@sdesert.name: mobSD03_1
mobsd03_1@sdesert.examine:
This dog looks like it has never been tamed. Its fur stands
on end, and it is full of brambles. You don't think you should 
pet it.
mobsd03_1@sdesert.description: A thin, mangy beast lurks about here.

mobsd08@sdesert.name: mobSD08
mobsd08@sdesert.examine:
You see an old man, covered with wrinkles and other deformities. 
He is obviously very displeased with your presence, and wants to 
kill you for your knowledge of where he lives.
mobsd08@sdesert.description: A mad hermit is here, getting ready to mutilate you!

mobsd06_1@sdesert.name: mobSD06_1
mobsd06_1@sdesert.examine:
This snake is doing its best to blend in with its surroundings.
Most of its victims usually get attacked because they step on it.
mobsd06_1@sdesert.description: A rattler is coiled up here, trying to be invisible.

mobsd12_1@sdesert.name: mobSD12_1
mobsd12_1@sdesert.examine: This little beast would be very frightening if it were larger.
mobsd12_1@sdesert.description: A spiky-looking horny toad is here, taking an afternoon nap.

mobsd12_4@sdesert.name: mobSD12_4
mobsd12_4@sdesert.examine: This little beast would be very frightening if it were larger.
mobsd12_4@sdesert.description: A spiky-looking horny toad is here, taking an afternoon nap.

mobsd00_1@sdesert.name: mobSD00_1
mobsd00_1@sdesert.examine:
This wee armadillo looks fairly well-armored.  Doesn't look like
he could do much damage, but would still be difficult to kill.
mobsd00_1@sdesert.description: A small rodent with armored scales slowly crosses the path.
